abstract: 'If I can change the world, it would be quieter'. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Moyne'.
description: Five boys from Yambuk talk about what it means to be young in a small regional town and the various activities the town has to offer. They tell of the fun times growing up in the country, what they would like to change about the world and their ambitions for the future.
